scripts.compile: tsc && for file in $(find dist -name '*.js' -o -name '*.map'); do NEWFILENAME=`echo "$file" | sed 's/.js$/.mjs/g; s/.js.map$/.mjs.map/g'`; mv "$file" $NEWFILENAME; sed -i 's/.js/.mjs/g' $NEWFILENAME; done
scripts.test:e2e: echo "Error: no e2e test specified, i.e. run with cmd node e2e " && exit 1
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run compile
